title: Creates the crime of unauthorized radio transmission, a class D felony, punishable by imprisonment and a fine in the amount of not less than $10,000.00
summary: Creates the crime of unauthorized radio transmission for those who broadcast radio transmissions without obtaining a license to do so from the FCC; makes it class D felony punishable by imprisonment and a fine.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to prohibition against unauthorized radio transmissions
